dialog.text: Last week I had a massive blowout with Pete.  He stormed off.  He says he loves his job in the factory at Baxters.  I mean, I know he pays most of the bills, but if he wanted to go to College we could make it work.   Anyway, did you get anything done over the weekend?

joins.text: You made more progress than I did.

dialog.text: I am starting to fall behind I think and not sure if I will catch up.  We're already halfway through and I don't feel like I have done anything.  Jeff said we could do some pair programming later this week so hopefully that will help me get something done.  Better go - team meeting now!
